title: DC Studios Ends Henry Cavill's Superman
description:
This video is brought to you by World Anvil. Use code "MIDNIGHT" to get 40% off the annual membership at https://www.worldanvil.com/?c=midnight
Henry Cavill has been DC's cinematic Superman for nearly a decade now, but that has come to an end. With DC Studios CEO James Gunn announcing that they are moving on from the actor going forward. I talk about what that means for Cavill and Clark Kent here.
Music by Epidemic Sound (http://www.epidemicsound.com)
Follow me on Twitter: https://twitter.com/midnightcap
